name: Hornby Organic Oatmeal Raisin Bar
description:
The satisfying chew of the perfect oatmeal raisin cookie, in bar form.Ingredients: rolled oats (gluten-free), peanut butter, honey, tapioca syrup, raisins (raisins, sunflower oil), peanuts, sea salt, cinnamon.Allergens: peanuts, may contain traces of sesame and tree nuts.Based on beautiful Hornby Island, BC, the team at Hornby Organic follows traditional family recipes to create tasty fuel for all your outdoor pursuits.
